I am a user.

The user learns how to build networks, parameterize nodes and links, and perform simulations on the graphical interface.

I am a lecturer.

The lecturer learns how to teach computational neuroscience using NEST Desktop.

I am a deployer.

The deployer learns how to set up NEST Desktop on a machine via the Python Package, Docker or Singularity installation.

I am a developer.

The developer learns the source code architecture of NEST Desktop and how to contribute code or enhancements to the project.
